entity.name: Part_occurrence
entity.description: A Part_occurrence specifies that one Product_view_definition uses or may use another Product_view_definition as a component at a particular location in its assembly.

inverse.name: location
inverse.description: the optional position of the occurrence.

where.label: WR1
where.description: Either the location or location_indicator shall exist.

entity.name: Part_instance
entity.description: A Part_instance is the occurrence of a part within a subassembly of an assembly.

explicit.name: assembly
explicit.description: an Assembly_component that is the same instance of the attribute view1 as this Part_instance and the same instance of the attribute view2 as the view1 of the next_assembly_usage referenced by the attribute sub_assembly.

explicit.name: sub_assembly
explicit.description: a Next_assembly_usage that is the same instance of the attribute view2 as this Part_instance and the same instance of the product_view_definition referenced by the attribute view1 as the product_view_definition referenced by the attribute view2 of the attribute assembly.

unique.label: UR1
unique.description: The combination of the assembly and sub_assembly attributes shall be unique.

where.label: WR1
where.description: The instance of Part_instance shall not be the same as the instance of assembly.

where.label: WR2
where.description: The view1 attribute of the Part_instance shall reference the same instance of product_view_definition as the view1 for the assembly.

where.label: WR3
where.description: The view2 of the Part_instance shall reference the same instance of product_view_definition as the view2 for the sub_assembly.

where.label: WR4
where.description: The view2 for the assembly shall reference, or be related to, the same instance of product_view_definition as the view1 for the sub_assembly.
